titleStmt.title: The Lord Mayor's show being a description of the solemnity at the inauguration of the truly loyal and Right Honourable Sir William Prichard, Kt., Lord Mayor of the city of London, President of the Honorable Artillery-Company, and a member of the Worshipful Company of Merchant-Taylors : perform'd on Monday, Sept. XXX, 1682 : with several new loyal songs and catches.
titleStmt.author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
